Description: Fragment of a lead writing tablet with a curse text incised in Greek alphabetic characters. Joins with 1890.3-4.4 and 5.
Curator's comments: See Wilburn 2012 (with previous references) for a survey of evidence for magical practices in Roman times. Bibliography: Wilburn, A. 2012, Material magica. The archaeology of magic in Roman Egypt, Cyprus and Spain (Ann Arbor: University of Michigan Press),
